unnormalised: Ensure your org. is protected against ransomware; implement MFA and regularly update your systems. Also, consider a cybersecurity audit by a reputable firm like KPMG or Deloitte ASAP.
normalised: Ensure your organization is protected against ransomware; implement M-F-A and regularly update your systems. Also, consider a cybersecurity audit by a reputable firm like K-P-M-G or Deloitte A-S-A-P.
